channel.title: Restormel {no whitelist} -24/7- [pvp] [mmorpg] [medieval] [war] [clans] [mcmmo]
channel.description:
[b][size=24pt]About Restormel[/size] [/b]Restormel is a server that came out of the idea of merging the Minecraft world with gameplay from various MMO's such as World of Warcraft, Star Wars: The Old Republic, Rift, and many more. We, as admins, feel as if we have manifested this idea into Restormel, and created the ultimate Minecraft MMO experience.
[b]Server info: [/b] [b]Dungeons:[/b] Epic dungeons that you can complete either solo, in a group of 4, or even up to a raid group of 10.
[b]Classes:[/b] The lore of Restormel revolves around two warring nations competing for the throne in the capital of Restormel, which is held by a tyrant king, King Titus. Each nation is entitled to three unique classes each.
[b]Towns:[/b] Join a current town or create your own community. If you wish, you can put your town under the control of your governing nation, and join in on the PVP events.
[b]PvP:[/b] Every two months there is a nation war commenced, where Towns flying the banner of their nations compete for supremacy. It's either kill, or be killed. Towns independent of nations cannot compete in the nation war.
[b]Any Questions? Queries? Ask in the forum below! [/b] Currently, we estimate the server to have finished development by the 25th of April, 2012.
Additional information about development and how Restormel will work can be found on our website.
[b]Our Website: http://restormel.enjin.com [/b]

item.title: Restormel {no whitelist} -24/7- [pvp] [mmorpg] [medieval] [war] [clans] [mcmmo]
item.dc:creator: @Condemned1 Condemned1
item.description:
@Condemned1 wrote:

[size=24pt]About Restormel[/size]
Restormel is a server that came out of the idea of merging the Minecraft world with gameplay from various MMO’s such as World of Warcraft, Star Wars: The Old Republic, Rift, and many more.
We, as admins, feel as if we have manifested this idea into Restormel, and created the ultimate Minecraft MMO experience.

Server info:

Dungeons: Epic dungeons that you can complete either solo, in a group of 4, or even up to a raid group of 10.

Classes: The lore of Restormel revolves around two warring nations competing for the throne in the capital of Restormel, which is held by a tyrant king, King Titus. Each nation is entitled to three unique classes each.

Towns: Join a current town or create your own community. If you wish, you can put your town under the control of your governing nation, and join in on the PVP events.

PvP: Every two months there is a nation war commenced, where Towns flying the banner of their nations compete for supremacy. It’s either kill, or be killed. Towns independent of nations cannot compete in the nation war.

Any Questions? Queries? Ask in the forum below!

Currently, we estimate the server to have finished development by the 25th of April, 2012.

Additional information about development and how Restormel will work can be found on our website.

Our Website: http://restormel.enjin.com

Read full topic
